content: by anastacia zittel anastaciaknits@verizon net anastaciaknits on ravelry finished coasters measure 3 25 inches across materials size h crochet hook worsted weight cotton yarn such as lily sugar n cream set of 4 uses 20 grams / between 30-40 yards gauge 1st round measures 1 75 inches pattern notes work in continuous rounds do not turn directions round 1 chain 5 join with a slip_stitch round 2 chain 5 counts as 1st double_crochet & chain 2 space in this round & round 3 3 double_crochet in same space 2 chain *3 double_crochet chain 2 repeat from * for a total of 3 times end with 2 double_crochet in same chain space join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain- 5 slip_stitch into corner space round 3 chain 5 3 double_crochet in same space * chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet first complete corner made repeat from * three times total end with 2 double_crochet in same chain space & join to 3rd chain of beg chain 5 slip_stitch into 1st corner round 4 chain 1 * work 3 single_crochet in corner space & single_crochet in every double_crochet & chain space along the side around repeat from * around join with slip_stitch into first single_crochet end off & weave in ends feel free to make as many of these as you like for local craft fairs/auctions/raffles/bazaars but please do not sell finished items online the pattern itself is not for sale if making for charity please let me know the name of the charity & include my contact info with the item anastaciaknits@verizon net / anastaciaknits on ravelry thanks thanks to pamelascrafts vapmore & redcurlysue for their test crocheting/thoughts/editing also a big thank you goes out to the testing pool group on ravelry copyright 2008 anastaciaknits on ravelry
